text: Okay, what are your predicted grades for A-levels? And do you mind me asking your GCSE grades? Yeah I can try and help you, I had to get work experience for my uni application. I don't know if you have any contacts in the industry you are trying to get into cause that would help? Otherwise if you look up companies in the industry and see if they provide any placement or shadowing opportunities and otherwise you could try to get contact detail for them and email the companies to see if you could go in for a day or two to see what it's like :blush:
That's okay, I only got it when I came to university but I found it useful when I was trying to arrange my elective placement

My predicted grades are AAC/ABC and my GCSE grades: 1 A, 3 B's, 5 C's and 2 D's (Lol, Chemistry being the D:joy:) haha! I haven't got any contacts but I'm going to look into contacting Northwick park hospital and Ealing hospital to see if they have any opportunities for me to shadow someone. Oo, what's an elective placement?
